name: Stickman Destruction
description: Do you like stickmans? These courageous little men with whom you can do everything, or almost.In this game, the stickman is going to be the victim of your quest for points.
minimum_requirements: OS: WINDOWS XP / WINDOWS VISTA / WINDOWS 7 / WINDOWS 8 / WINDOWS 10 Processor: Any 64 or 32 bit processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL Compatible Video card Storage: 15 MB available space
